name: Planet Hopper (GallinaGames)
description:
Created for Ludum Dare #50

Gameplay:

Fly around a randomly generated planet and collect materials to escape the Mothership! But beware - if you stay on a planet for too long, it will be able to lock onto your location and attack. Collect Uranium to fuel your warp drive to move to the next planet and delay the Mothership in its search for you!

Controls:

WASD: move

L. Mouse: Shoot

E: mine materials

Tab: Upgrades/Repair

Space: Warp

Esc: Pause
